resources.title: Tour 8 Shootout - Left to Right Wind Pointed at 2 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Left to Right Wind

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a GREAT chance at a hole in one. Bounce right before the bunker and the green will feed the ball nicely down to the hole. From the front tee, don't use any spin and from the 2nd tee use 2 - 3 bars of backspin. You'll need to adjust with a small amount of curl if you get a sidewind more than 7 MPH (curl against the wind).

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 153 554 L 143 232" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="153" cy="554" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="232" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 656 L 143 232" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="148" cy="656" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="232" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 143 759 L 143 232" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="759" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="143" cy="232" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a very tough par 4. There's no room for mistakes whatsoever. The drive is the key. You need to bounce over the bunker on the left side or keep to the right of it. Use a wood with a good amount of curl on your second shot. You'll also want to use a ball with good sidespin. Use both curl and sidespin to land on the green. A birdie is a good score here. It's very hard to eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 266 812 L 223 405" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 223 405 L 217 299" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 217 299 C 236 162 236 162 302 116" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="266" cy="812" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="405" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="217" cy="299" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="302" cy="116" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 258 864 L 223 405" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 223 405 L 217 299" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 217 299 C 236 162 236 162 302 116" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="258" cy="864" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="405" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="217" cy="299" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="302" cy="116" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 251 915 L 223 405" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 223 405 L 217 299" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 217 299 C 236 162 236 162 302 116" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="251" cy="915" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="223" cy="405" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="217" cy="299" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="302" cy="116" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the typical way to play the hole unless you get good tailwind. Bounce over the bunker with some curl and max sidespin to the right. For the second shot a dunk is a very good option since the green will allow a missed dunk to fall back down to the hole for an easy putt.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 181 684 C 145 467 145 467 168 341" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 341 L 196 206" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 196 206 L 303 113" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="181" cy="684" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="341" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="196" cy="206" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="303" cy="113" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 190 742 C 145 467 145 467 168 341" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 341 L 196 206" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 196 206 L 303 113" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="190" cy="742" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="341" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="196" cy="206" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="303" cy="113" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 192 799 C 145 467 145 467 168 341" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 341 L 196 206" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 196 206 L 303 113" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="192" cy="799" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="341" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="196" cy="206" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="303" cy="113" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: If you get a good tailwind you can go directly over the bunker and kill it as far as possible on the fairway. That will leave you with a short iron or a wedge for your second shot and an excellent opportunity for an eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 181 684 C 116 435 116 435 201 189" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 201 189 L 302 104" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="181" cy="684" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="201" cy="189" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="302" cy="104" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 190 742 C 116 435 116 435 201 189" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 201 189 L 302 104" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="190" cy="742" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="201" cy="189" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="302" cy="104" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 192 799 C 116 435 116 435 201 189" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 201 189 L 302 104" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="192" cy="799" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="201" cy="189" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="302" cy="104" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Tour 8 - Strategy and Tips for Eagle

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: No matter the wind, the drive is just trying to get as far down the fairway as possible. With enough tailwind you can get your second shot over to the second fairway on the left. With a good shot, topspin and right sidespin you should be able to get the ball to the green. Making an eagle on this hole is not easy.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 194 868 L 150 413" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 150 413 C 131 301 131 301 154 163" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 154 163 L 164 112" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="194" cy="868" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="150" cy="413" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="163" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="164" cy="112" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 194 911 L 150 413" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 150 413 C 131 301 131 301 154 163" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 154 163 L 164 112" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="194" cy="911" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="150" cy="413" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="163" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="164" cy="112" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 955 L 150 413" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 150 413 C 131 301 131 301 154 163" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 154 163 L 164 112" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="193" cy="955" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="150" cy="413" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="163" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="164" cy="112" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With headwind or sidewind, you won't be able to reach the second fairway with you second shot. In that case, keep playing up the right side and use a long iron with a good amount of backspin for your third shot. You can also use the rough just after the bunker and let your ball roll out to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 194 868 L 160 413" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 413 L 203 228" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 203 228 L 181 113" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="194" cy="868" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="413" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="228" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="181" cy="113" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 194 911 L 160 413" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 413 L 203 228" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 203 228 L 181 113" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="194" cy="911" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="413" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="228" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="181" cy="113" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 955 L 160 413" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 413 L 203 228" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 203 228 L 181 113" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="193" cy="955" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="413" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="203" cy="228" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="181" cy="113" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Tour 8 Shootout - Hard Left to Right Wind
Tour 8 Shootout - Headwind Pointed at 5 O`clock
Tour 8 Shootout - Left to Right Wind

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a tougher par 3 than it looks. Main approach is to go on the fairway in the front left corner of the green. From the first tee, you shouldn't use any backspin and only right sidespin. You can also use the rough beside the bunker to bounce it there using 2 bars of topspin. From the second tee, use the Guardian with max backspin and bounce it on the fairway in the same front left corner. That will give you an opportunity for a hole in one.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 177 585 C 119 417 119 417 151 256" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="177" cy="585" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="256" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 181 663 C 119 417 119 417 151 256" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="663" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="256" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 183 743 C 119 417 119 417 151 256" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="743" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="256" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Many times you won't be able to get to the second fairway with your driver so put your ball up as close to the rough on top as possible. If you go too short, you'll need to bounce before the rough on your second shot with max left sidespin combined with 4 bars of topspin. Apply a small amount of curl to the left.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 102 830 L 155 378" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 155 378 C 167 247 167 247 149 180" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="102" cy="830" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="155" cy="378" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="149" cy="180" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 102 885 L 155 378" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 155 378 C 167 247 167 247 149 180" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="102" cy="885" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="155" cy="378" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="149" cy="180" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 106 943 L 155 378" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 155 378 C 167 247 167 247 149 180" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="106" cy="943" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="155" cy="378" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="149" cy="180" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: Same drive as the black path but if you have a wood with more distance you can carry your second shot over the rough with 0.5 - 1 bars of topspin and max left sidespin. Apply curl to the left and that should get you close to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 102 830 L 144 378" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 144 378 C 163 247 163 247 134 147" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 134 147 L 113 99" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="102" cy="830" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="378" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="134" cy="147" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="113" cy="99" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 102 885 L 144 378" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 144 378 C 163 247 163 247 134 147" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 134 147 L 113 99" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="102" cy="885" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="378" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="134" cy="147" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="113" cy="99" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 106 943 L 144 378" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 144 378 C 163 247 163 247 134 147" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 134 147 L 113 99" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="106" cy="943" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="144" cy="378" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="134" cy="147" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="113" cy="99" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind on your drive you can bounce on the first fairway with max topspin and get down to the second fairway. From there, you'll have a long or short iron to the pin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 102 830 L 165 387" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 165 387 L 188 283" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 188 283 L 127 97" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="102" cy="830" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="165" cy="387" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="283" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="127" cy="97" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 102 885 L 165 387" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 165 387 L 188 283" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 188 283 L 127 97" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="102" cy="885" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="165" cy="387" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="283" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="127" cy="97" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 106 943 L 165 387" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 165 387 L 188 283" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 188 283 L 127 97" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="106" cy="943" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="165" cy="387" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="283" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="127" cy="97" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

resources.title: Tour 8 - Tips for Backspin Eagle Shot
Tour 8 - Tips and Strategy for Eagle

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: If you don't want to play aggressively, you should go straight ahead with 4-6 bars of topspin, combined with a small amount of right curl. For the second shot, you NEED to have a club with a lot of backspin. The reason is that the sliver of fairway just before the green is uphill and will trick you, so avoid it. With a lot of backspin on your long or short iron you will be able to go directly onto the green (possibly with a dunk).

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 224 719 C 126 414 126 414 180 220" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 180 220 L 285 136" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="224" cy="719" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="180" cy="220" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="285" cy="136" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind or side/tailwind to the right you can play this hole more aggressively. Apply a good amount of curl to the right along with max topspin and right sidespin. You'll want to get really close to the green for a second shot with a short iron or wedge. This will give you a good opportunity for an eagle.

resources.title: Tour 8 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 3 O`clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is one of the easiest par 3's in the game. You can play this one in two different ways. One way is with the Guardian and max backspin directly onto the green. If you're playing from the first or third tee, you should try bouncing in between the bunkers. Use about 3 bars of backspin and it will give you a really good opportunity for a hole in one.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 197 561 L 183 234" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="197" cy="561" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="234" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 201 657 L 183 234" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="201" cy="657" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="234" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 203 745 L 183 234" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="203" cy="745" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="234" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a hole where the drive is crucial. If you miss the fairway, you will NOT be able to reach the green in two. Be aware of the trees in the middle since they can easily give you a par or a bogey. Use max topspin and bounce near the beginning of the trees. For the second shot you will need a wood club with a good amount of curl. With tailwind use 4-5 bars of backspin and with headwind use 2-3 bars of backspin. Bounce over the creek and onto the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 202 837 C 161 549 161 549 196 417" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 196 417 L 208 343" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 208 343 C 210 251 210 251 195 159" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="202" cy="837" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="196" cy="417" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="208" cy="343" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="195" cy="159" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With good side/tailwind you should be able to go on the right side, especially if you play form the first or second tees. Bounce your drive over the rough patch and you will have a much straighter second shot into the green and a good shot at an albatross.
